lead_paragraph: The Republican nominee again raised the possibility of violence against his opponent, saying of her Secret Service agents, “Take their guns away.”

byline.contributor: Nick Corasaniti reported from Miami, and Nicholas Confessore and Michael Barbaro from New York.
byline.original: By NICK CORASANITI, NICHOLAS CONFESSORE and MICHAEL BARBARO

headline.print_headline: ‘See What Happens’ to Clinton If Guards Disarm, Trump Says
headline.main: Donald Trump Says Hillary Clinton’s Bodyguards Should Disarm to ‘See What Happens to Her’

snippet: The Republican nominee again raised the possibility of violence against his opponent, saying of her Secret Service agents, “Take their guns away.”...
abstract: Donald J Trump, in Miami campaign rally, suggests Secret Service agents who guard Hillary Clinton voluntarily disarm to 'see what happens to her' without protection of their weapons; comment follows false claims to audience that Clinton wants to eliminate Second Amendment, referring to her gun control policies; critics charge Trump with provoking protesters and inciting violence with such incendiary statements.
